languages.text: {n}Соломон бросает на парочку безразличный взгляд:{/n} "А, местные любители сомнительных игрищ — они не стоят нашего времени".
{n}Solomorne casts an indifferent glance at the pair.{/n} "Local folk and their strange amusements — they're not worth our time."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон бросает на парочку безразличный взгляд:{/n} "А, местные любители сомнительных игрищ — они не стоят нашего времени".

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙冷漠地看了这两个人一眼。{/n}“不过是当地人古怪的娱乐活动罢了，这些人不值得我们浪费时间。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts an indifferent glance at the pair.{/n} "Local folk and their strange amusements — they're not worth our time."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙冷漠地看了这两个人一眼。{/n}“不过是当地人古怪的娱乐活动罢了，这些人不值得我们浪费时间。”

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは二人に関心が無さそうな視線を投げかけた。{/n}「地元の連中と妙な道楽など、私たちの時間を割く価値もありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts an indifferent glance at the pair.{/n} "Local folk and their strange amusements — they're not worth our time."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは二人に関心が無さそうな視線を投げかけた。{/n}「地元の連中と妙な道楽など、私たちの時間を割く価値もありません」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne observa con indiferencia a los dos hombres.{/n} «Lugareños y sus extrañas diversiones; no merecen nuestro tiempo».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts an indifferent glance at the pair.{/n} "Local folk and their strange amusements — they're not worth our time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne observa con indiferencia a los dos hombres.{/n} «Lugareños y sus extrañas diversiones; no merecen nuestro tiempo».

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, adamlara kayıtsız bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Yerel halkın tuhaf eğlenceleri işte, vakit harcamaya değmez."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts an indifferent glance at the pair.{/n} "Local folk and their strange amusements — they're not worth our time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, adamlara kayıtsız bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Yerel halkın tuhaf eğlenceleri işte, vakit harcamaya değmez."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne lance un regard indifférent aux deux hommes.{/n} « Les étranges divertissements des habitants de cette planète ne méritent pas notre attention. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts an indifferent glance at the pair.{/n} "Local folk and their strange amusements — they're not worth our time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne lance un regard indifférent aux deux hommes.{/n} « Les étranges divertissements des habitants de cette planète ne méritent pas notre attention. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne wirft einen gleichgültigen Blick auf die beiden.{/n} "Die Einheimischen und ihre seltsamen Gepflogenheiten – sie sind unsere Zeit nicht wert."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casts an indifferent glance at the pair.{/n} "Local folk and their strange amusements — they're not worth our time."
